  Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Cla=
sh


  Arrow looks at Stiller and then at Burning Hammer.

  Arrow: You tak=
e Perplex back inside.

  Burning Hammer nods and Arrow approaches Stiller.=
..

hoogroups.com

      Arrow approaches Stiller, looking very angry...

      =

        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 8:05 PM
        Subj=
ect: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


        STILLER





     =
   (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clutches his f=
ists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller motions for Arro=
w to come...)

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Soul=
stice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday=
, July 07, 2001 6:29 PM
          Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... ag=
ain/Clash


          Arrow ducks the arrow (heehee) and fires back 7 shots=
 at Stiller...

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From:=
 *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturd=
ay, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM
            Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack..=
. again/Clash


            MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / =
LEE / DEPP





            (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fire=
s a missile at Nightlight.)



            (Barrymore takes one of the ener=
gy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 la=
ser beams at Nightlight.)



            (Depp is struck by both energy bal=
ls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlight.)


=

            (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pin from a grenade an=
d throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



            (Stiller growls =
and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



            (Lee fires a ball of fire at N=
ightlight's legs, attempting to trip her up.)



            (Virgo fires a=
 red energy draining dart at Nightlight...)
              ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
              From: airly2000@... 
              To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 2:35 AM
  =
            Subject: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


              =
Nightlight::

              Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dificul=
ty she could avoid the 
              attacks of McGowan and Stronghold, Sh=
e fired 2 energy balls to 
              McGowan, 2 against Barrymore, 2 ag=
aisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
              against Airbomber, 2 agaisnt S=
tranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
              she was hit by the com=
bined attack of Barrymore and Stranato, doing 
              her fell. 

  =
            She felt stunned and she would be defendless a short while.
